text: Erik Selin (born 1967) is a Swedish billionaire property developer, and the CEO and controlling owner of Fastighets AB Balder. Erik Selin was born in 1967. Selin is the chairman of Collector Credit AB, SATO Oyj, and Collector AB. Selin lives in Gothenburg, Sweden. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:People from Gothenburg Category:Swedish businesspeople Category:Swedish billionaires
title: Erik Selin
